summary: You have been inside a tower since the day you were born. Many stories exist within the books inside that tower. One day, you—who have never known the outside world—meet a mysterious man named Ornit.

name: Omori x Yume Nikki Crossover Fangame
summary:
Madotsuki goes on an adventure with her friends in Headspace!

Battle enemies and find useful effects!

name: Omega Nugget
summary: Touch your screen to control Omega Nugget, only by steering left or right while automatically running forwards. Try to shoot down all the cars standing in your way and collect boosters to increase fire rate, fire power, health and other stats to help you complete each stage,

name: Omega Knockout: Punch Boxing
summary: Dodge, block and punch your opponents in Omega Knockout, a retro arcade boxing experience that packs a punch! With its vibrant 16-bit art style and gameplay-driven animations, you'll enjoy precision and excitement in every match.

name: OMD, Noobs!
summary: "OMD, NOOBS!" is a small Arena Shooter I made during a weekend. It is inspired by DOOM, Quake and in general the Arena Shooter genre. The artstyle is loosely based on NES limitations but not completely.

name: Omusubi
summary: One day, Hinako, a high school student, finds her path to school transformed into the Sanzu River, where she meets a strange-looking man named Issa. Will she be able to get through the mysterious devices of the mysterious mansion and return safely to her family?

name: Omega Space
summary: Ω-SPACE - The last dimension you can reach

name: Omochapon
summary: Omochapon is a little packet of fun!

name: OMSI 2: Add-on Zürich Tram Linie 11
summary: Having a tram as a vehicle in OMSI 2, now you have the opportunity to drive through the mere center of Zurich and enjoy the classical, intact and divine architecture of this unique worldwide famous city.

name: Omega No Sunshine 2
summary:
Omega No Sunshine , second game of the title, is an arcade collecthation game where players have to travel through different places in order to collect sun rings. Humanity is destroying their own world and an another time, it need someone able to collect them all and restore the sun to shine again.

This title was delisted and later republished in 2025 as a new release and self-published by Galoxyum with ongoing updates and features.

name: Omnimancer
summary: Roguelite-style game in which you must explore an ancient tomb filled with dangers and practically infinite magic

name: Omni Blade
summary: Omni Blade is an immersive and tactically challenging retro RPG inspired by classic games such as 7th Saga, Grandia, and Chrono Trigger.

name: Omut
summary: A punishing fever dream combining abject terror, dark comedy, and many, many deaths.

name: Ominous Recall
summary: Ominous Recall: A chilling survival horror game set in a photorealistic Middle East. Confront a terrifying Jinn possessing Stephen and unravel its dark power in this intense psychological thriller.

name: Om Nom: Run 2
summary: Ready, set, dash! Join the omtastic Om Nom Run 2 challenge and prove you’re the speedster champion.

name: Omega 6 The Triangle Stars
summary: OMEGA 6 The Triangle Stars is an adventure game with 16-bit styling, based on the manga by former Nintendo art director, Takaya Imamura.

name: Omega Phenex Commenced Project Six
summary: You will become a pilot of the mech “Icarus,” which has tremendous maneuverability. You will enjoy a fight and face large powerful armies and rivals by moving from skimming the surface of the sea to the cloud with Icarus. This game is a high-speed mech shooting game capable of firing massive amounts of missiles.

name: Omoiyari wo Hagukumu Katarikake Ehon: Miffy to Asobou Utaou
Omashu Dash
summary: Dash down a series of tunnels and aim to complete the level as fast as you can!

name: Omega No Sunshine 2
summary:
This game is an arcade-collectathon-exploration game where an unknow being is doing its best to avoid the end of his/her world because of the sun disappearing. Through different places the player have to run and collect sun rings to progress ever further. The game include a story, additional content and a rpg oriented dlc. The base game minimum game time is at least about 16hours.

This video game is born after omega no sunshine 1 (2019) made by the galoxyum studio.

name: Omelet You Cook
summary: The cozy chaotic cooking roguelike. Assemble omelets for quirky students using ingredients from a conveyor belt. Discover wacky combinations to satisfy the ever-demanding Principal Clucker.

name: Omega Timeline: Poppy's Story - A ChristmAUs Carol
summary: Following an unexpected Snowstorm hitting the Omega Timeline, Poppy and Cadence find themselves trapped in a part of the timeline's residential areas. As such, they must way to pass the time by speaking with the hundred or so people who find themselves in their same situation until people arrive to help.

name: OmOneko
summary: “A story about cat girls … with bite.” Nekos have evolved in the shadows of human society. Beautiful. Mysterious. Chaotic. And now, three of them live with you. Will you be able to get past the stigma and grow closer to them? OmOneko is a tale of cat and mouse... and rats.

name: Omega
summary: A difficult precision platformer set in a surreal world. Overcome challenging environments with extreme jumps and overwhelming obstacles as you face a constant challenge on your way to the summit. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Ominoflux
summary: Clear lines, crush enemies, and save the realm of Ominoflux. Master the chaos and build your power in a roguelite adventure with multiple game modes. Ominoflux will surely make you think, and maybe even smile too.

name: Omnn
summary: A tale of hubris in the far-flung future, inspired by that one Sci-Fi novel.

name: Omori: The Dreamer
summary: THE DREAMER is an OMORI mod (fan sequel) set immediately after the good ending. While telling the truth, SUNNY passes out due to his injuries, returning to dreaming, despite his choice to let go. HEADSPACE is now empty of any residents...or so it appears. Remember to stay alert, and pay attention. Some things aren't yours anymore.

name: Om Nom: Candy Flick
summary: This augmented reality app brings Om Nom, little green monster, to life. Enjoy 3D animation and have fun feeding your own Om Nom candy that he loves wherever you go together.

name: Omanah
summary: Myst-Like 3D free exploration game

name: Omashu: Snail Racing
summary: An insect sized time trial with online highscores!

name: O.M.N.I.S.: Overnight Train
summary:
O.M.N.I.S. – Overnight Train is a short, atmospheric walking simulator with psychological undertones.Inspired by late-night train rides, liminal spaces, and the sense of being caught in an endless loop.

A game about repetition, perception, and losing control.

name: Omusubikororin Kurenai
summary: This simple 3D game is inspired by the classic Japanese folk tale Omusubi Kororin. Kick away the enemies that stand in your way and reclaim the lost rice ball!

name: Omen
summary: Infiltrate the remnants of a fallen empire in this dark sci-fi isometric action game where extraction meets base defense. Extract valuable loot, establish defenses against hostile fanatics, and unlock the gateway to a dimension of cosmic dread that defies comprehension.

name: Omicrox
summary: Omicrox takes Ultimate Tic Tac Toe and adds powerful one-use ability cards for unlimited strategic possibilities. Earn abilities as you play, like swapping boards, blocking moves, or stealing cards, and use them to outsmart friends or AI in this battle of tactics.

name: Ominigun
summary: Ominigun is a fast-paced and challenging bullet hell action game. Use a variety of weapons and buffs to fight enemy hordes, dodge projectiles, and defeat unique bosses. Combine abilities, react quickly, and overcome intense, chaotic battles.

name: Om Nom: Run & Om Nom: Run 2
summary: Double the run, be number one!

name: Omega Point
summary: A MIXTAPE AT THE END OF THE WORLD. A mech exploration game about listening into the last remaining radio stations of humanity.

name: Ominous
summary: Ominous is a 2D pixel art adventure platformer where you follow Gowan McDerrick, a British soldier from the Edwardian era, on a journey through ancient tombs and mysterious ruins. Guided by an old friend, Gowan uncovers a world of mysticism, intrigue, and forgotten history—and discovers himself.

name: Omnifate
summary: OMNIFATE is a short little turn-based RPG with differences to tropes commonly used in its genre.

name: Omega Luma: The First Battle
summary: Fight and Survive. The destiny that awaits you will affect you and the entire world.

name: Omakase
summary: Omakase is a relaxing cooking and creation game. Slice, mix, and explore new ingredients while completing quests. Customize your display to your liking, crafting unique compositions of ingredients and objects. There's no pressure; unwind and enjoy the culinary art at your own pace.

name: Omertà: Mafia Novel
summary: Noir visual novel set in 1950s New York. Infiltrate a prison, build a smuggling network, and shape fates through tough choices across branching paths.

name: Omega Protocol
summary: "Choose, boost, survive!" Rogue-lite Co-op Action!! 3 rookies vs mutants with ONE shared power-up. Survive together by passing boost between teammates! Sniper needs precision? Give it! Tank under attack? Switch instantly! Steal power from allies or sacrifice yourself. Teamwork meets betrayal.

name: OMG!: Overhead Micro Game
summary: Single-screen puzzle action with lasers, switches, pits, and a troublesome creature. Solve each level at your own pace, or speedrun your way to a shiny new best time.

name: Omega Man
summary: "Omega Man" is an interactive fiction game . After a global viral outbreak, as the only surviving male, players bears the responsibility to perpetuate the human races. Throughout the game, players' numerous choices will determine multiple possible endings.

name: Omni-Dissonance
summary: You've awoken, after your crew has vanished. Drift through its otherworldly architecture to collect the black boxes containing their neural data and read fragmented clues to what drew them here.

name: Ominous Gift
summary: Escape this dungeon that's like a prison! Embark on an adventure through the remnants of an ancient kingdom, using unique weapons that define how you traverse the world, fight your way through hostile inhabitants as you find the path out of this dungeon that was once a great kingdom.
